page.title: 03FARMING IN LITTLE KIMBLE
page.content: There are upwards of 25 farms in the block of which only 2 or 3 are used for mainly growing crops. The rest are small Dairy and Sheep farms. Dodd's Farm near{North Lee}still has its milk collected in milk churns daily instead of by tanker as is more usual today. Meadowbrook Farm on the Aylesbury Road has an Ickneild herd of{Charolais {Cattle}which is rare in the area (being mainly kept in Devon). In the northeast of the block is an {agricultural research centre}which develops new types of fertiliser and experiments with crops.
